meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1540.

td.p: Jared Namenson, a headmaster from Berkeley, California
Bob Canter, a government relations representative from Martinez, California
David Combs, an electrical engineer from Long Beach, California (whose 2-day cash winnings total $22,601)

tr.td: FIRST LADIES
SECOND PLACE
THIRD WORLD
FOURTH ESTATE
FIFTH DIMENSION
SIXTH SENSE
